shinyEffects

Fancy CSS effects for shiny

Customize your shiny apps with these nice CSS effects

Installation

devtools::install_github("DivadNojnarg/shinyEffects")

Demo

library(shinyEffects)
shinyEffectsGallery()

Related Packages

library(shinydashboard)
library(shinydashboardPlus)
library(bs4Dash)
